problem.p: Which of the choices below describes the scenario depicted by the energy bar chart?

choicegroup.choice: A block attached to an unstretched spring is pulled with increasing speed along a rough flat surface.
A rope is lifting a box straight upward at constant speed.
A car traveling at high speed jams on the brakes and skids to a halt on a rough flat road.
A box slides down a rough slope, hits a spring at the bottom, compresses it and comes to rest.
A ball is shot straight upward from a compressed spring, then sticks to the ceiling.
A person is pushing a crate up a rough slope at constant speed.
